name: Remote Desktop Protocol Use Mstsc
description: Adversaries may use Valid Accounts to log into a computer using the Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP). The adversary may then perform actions as the logged-on user.
query: (((process.executable:/.*\\[Mm][Ss][Tt][Ss][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR process.pe.original_file_name:/[Mm][Ss][Tt][Ss][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND process.command_line:/.*\ \/[Vv]\:.*/) OR ((process.executable:/.*\\[Cc][Mm][Dd][Kk][Ee][Yy]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR process.pe.original_file_name:/[Cc][Mm][Dd][Kk][Ee][Yy]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND (process.command_line:/.*\ \/[Gg].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ \/[Uu].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ \/[Pp].*/)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(((process.executable:*\\mstsc.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:mstsc.exe) AND process.command_line:*\ \/v\:*) OR ((process.executable:*\\cmdkey.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:cmdkey.exe) AND (process.command_line:*\ \/g* AND process.command_line:*\ \/u* AND process.command_line:*\ \/p*)))`
